thread.title: This Parrot Sings Like Rihanna, And We're Impressed | The Huffington Post
thread.title_full: This Parrot Sings Like Rihanna, And We're Impressed | The Huffington Post

author: Ron Dicker
title: This Parrot Sings Like Rihanna, And We're Impressed | The Huffington Post
text:
This Parrot Sings Like Rihanna, And We're Impressed If this is real, you can knock us over with a feather. By Ron Dicker 
With her busy work schedule, Rihanna might want to consider a voice-double. Like this bird, for instance. 
A parrot is conquering the internet for its alleged ability to mimic RiRi’s part in her “Monster” collaboration with Eminem. 
The clip above appears to date back to 2016 , but we can understand why the parrot is getting an encore . If all is on the up-and-up, we could see our fine-feathered friend enlisting an agent ― or at least killin’ it at karaoke night. 
Here’s the original music video with Rihanna: 
As it’s wont to do, the internet inserted the parrot into the video: ALSO ON HUFFPOST Ron Dicker General Assignment Reporter, The Huffington Post MORE:
